description: Data Self-Portrait is a unique application for tracking life data and artistic visualization. By recording daily data such as sleep, consumption, mood and activities, the application transforms the dull numbers into flowing abstract art graphics, allowing you to "see" your life patterns from a new perspective. The minimalist information visualization design style, combined with the colorful data flow effect, enables your personalized data portrait to continuously evolve with each data addition, showcasing your unique life trajectory. It supports data statistics analysis, historical record management and data export functions. All data is stored locally, ensuring the protection of your privacy and security.

developer: Royal Insurance Corporation Of Bhutan Limited
description:
MyRICB is a mobile application of Royal Insurance Corporation of Bhutan Limited. It is a free, secured and convenient insurance application designed to facilitate the following functionalities: 
1. Repayment of Loan Installments
2. Deposit of Life Insurance Premium
3. Deposit of Deferred Annuity Premium
4. Viewing details of Loans and Insurance Policies
5. Payment on behalf of others (Friends, Relatives and Family)
6. Generating online statements such as Loan, Private Provident Fund and Group Insurance Scheme statements

Features:
* Click New User? Sign up and provide details.
* Confirm your registration by inserting the OTP number SMS in your mobile.
* Login to view details of your Insurance Policies and Loans with us. 
* You can pay your Loan Installments and Insurance Premiums by connecting to secured RMA Payment Gateway. 
* You will be notified by SMS once your Loans and Insurance policies are updated.
* By Selecting "Pay For Others" you can also track and simultaneously pay on behalf of your friends, family and relatives.
* Generate online statements such as Loan Statement, Private Provident Fund Statement and Group Insurance Scheme memos.
* You can avail all our services for free of charge. We aspire to serve you better by adding more new services in future. 

For any further clarification contact us at our Toll-Free No # 1811/1511 or write to us at feedback@ricb.bt.

BNB MPay is a mobile banking application of Bhutan National Bank Limited. It provides features that enables easy and convenient banking without the hassle of having to visit the bank.  BNB Mpay brings you the best in mobile banking, giving you a secure and easy way to manage your money on the go with instant sign-up using your mobile number.

Features:
•	Instant Sign-Up.
•	Set a 4-digit Login Password and transaction TPIN(Remember this Password and mPIN, do not share it with anyone).
•	View account balance, mini-statement and transaction details for all your savings and current accounts.
•	Immediate fund transfers to your own accounts in BNB, to customers in BNB and to customers in other banks in Bhutan. 
•	Transfer funds using beneficiary's mobile number (for BNB account holders only) or account number.
•	Stay in control of your accounts using Transaction Notifications.
•	Instantly activate, lock, cancel and change your PIN.
•	Temporarily block and unblock your debit card.
•	Modify your debit card daily spending limits as per your needs (within Nu. 40,000/day).
•	Block/Unblock your debit card on different terminals (ATM/POS).
•	View your debit card activity history. 
•	Manage your beneficiaries: Add beneficiary using mobile (for BNB account holders only) or account number, delete beneficiary and view beneficiary.  
•	Scan & Pay instantly to merchant using Merchant Pay.
•	Scan & Pay instantly to your friends and family using individual QR code.
•	Prepaid mobile recharge for BT and TashiCell.
•	Pay your postpaid mobile and leased line bills for TashiCell.
•	Pay your BPC electricity bill instantly,
•	Pay your Credit Card bill instantly.
•	Pay your DrukCom TV bill.
•	Loan Details: View your loan details
•	Loan Payments: Pay yours and others loan EMI instantly.
•	Offline request: Cheque book, ATM debit card and Account statement.
•	Calculator: Term Deposit, Recurring Deposit, Loan
•	Contact information of the bank with instant call facility to BNB contact center. 
•	Real time ATM and Branch locator: find your nearest BNB ATMs and branches.  
•	Rate the application to give us feedback to improve your mobile banking experience.
•	Avail offline request such as debit card request and cheque book request.

To allow us to give you a superior experience, we need your permission to access the following:
•	Location: To display the nearest ATMs/Branches.
•	Phone: To allow calling BNB Bank Contact center from the app.
•	SMS: To send an activation SMS from your device.
•	Camera: To scan the QR codes.
•	Phone status and Identity: To generate a phone ID.

Charges:
Registration and transactions in BNB Mpay are absolutely FREE of cost. However, in the future if any charges are applied for any up-coming features, you will be notified through SMS or it will be announced in the BNB website. Data charges from your mobile service provider may apply.

To discover all the BNB MPay app features, you should have a BNB account. 
Don’t bank with us? You can open an account by visiting your nearest BNB branch or extension.

For any feedback, queries or issues pertaining to BNB Mpay application please write to contact@bnb.bt or call us @ 6070

Binance is the world’s largest cryptoasset marketplace by trading volume*. Trusted by 250 million users worldwide, the Binance platform allows you to buy, sell, and hold up to 350 cryptoassets, including Bitcoin (BTC), Ether (ETH), Solana (SOL), Notcoin (NOT) and Pepe (PEPE) with some of the lowest trading fees in the market.

Risk Warning: Don’t invest unless you’re prepared to lose all the money you invest. This is a high-risk investment and you should not expect to be protected if something goes wrong. 
Not financial advice. All trading carries risk. Only risk capital you can afford to lose.
Take 2 mins to learn more:
https://www.binance.com/en-GB/legal/risk-warning.

Binance UK is presently not regulated or authorised by the UK Financial Conduct Authority ("FCA). Investments in cryptoassets are not covered by the Financial Ombudsman Service (“FOS”) or subject to protection under the Financial Services Compensation Scheme (“FSCS”).

Legal Entity: Nest Services Limited, trading as Binance, is the entity ultimately responsible for the Binance Services offered to UK based users through the Binance platform.

*by trading volume - Source: https://coinmarketcap.com/rankings/exchanges


Here's a small sample of what you can do on the Binance App:

- Choose from 350+ listed cryptoassets, set up recurring buys and price alerts, and trade with an arsenal of trading tools at your fingertips.
- Fund your account with a variety of payment options, including credit/debit card, P2P, and bank transfer.
- Automate your cryptoasset investments in a way that suits your preferences using Auto-Invest.
- All user funds are held 1:1 and protected by a Secure Asset Fund for Users (SAFU) worth $1 billion.
- Our ecosystem is built from the ground-up with state-of-the-art security measures, including real-time risk monitoring, stringent KYC protocols, and advanced end-to-end data encryption, to name a few.
- Participate in Binance Launchpad, or grow your portfolio with trading bots.
- In addition to an expansive, constantly-updated FAQ section, our 24/7 live chat customer support is available in English.

DrukPay is secure, fast, and convenient. Using DrukPay, all your transaction is just a few clicks away.

Gate is committed to providing secure and reliable trading services for Bitcoin, Ethereum, and over4,000 cryptocurrencies. With over 12 years of industry experience and 44 million users, Gate has become the preferred platform for crypto investors worldwide. 

A full-range crypto exchange with everything you want to trade. BTC, ETH, XRP, HBAR, MOODENG, DOGE, ADA, PEPE, SOL, SUI, LINK, DOT, KAS, EOS, CRV, ORDI, TAO, LTC, SHIB, JASMY, ENA, SEI, AVAX, RATS, XLM, FTM, APEPE, XRP5L, POL, RSR, FIL, ALGO, CFX, BCH, ETC, SUNDOG, KAIA, PNUT, BNB, NEAR, MAF, BAN, EML, BIGTIME, TOKEN, VIRTUAL, TIA, SATS, BOME, UNI, OM, and over4,000 more assets.

A full-featured crypto exchange offering all the top products in one place.
• Spot Trading: Supports full-range assets — including newly-listed tokens, margin trading, BRC-20, AI, MEME, RWA, DePin, ETH2.0 staking, ETFs, 5x leveraged ETFs, Layer 2, platform tokens, DeFi, and more.
• Futures:
Perpetuals, delivery contracts and more — covering 100+ markets with 0 maker fees. Enjoy points redemption and various rewards.
• Alpha:
Gate Alpha provides one-click access to all on-chain assets, supporting the widest range of tokens with minute-level listing speed. Earn Alpha points through holding and trading, which can be used to participate in token airdrops, TGE subscriptions, and limited-time events, unlocking additional benefits.
• Web3:
A new Web3 portal through which you can explore Gate Layer, Gate Perp DEX, Gate Fun, Meme Go, Web3 Launchpad, and more, and dive straight into the on-chain world.
• Launchpool:
Stake GT, USDT, ETH, and other major assets to earn new project tokens. Hourly airdrops, low entry, and high yield help you seize new market opportunities easily.
• CandyDrop:
Complete simple tasks like trading, depositing or inviting friends to earn ""candy"" and join lucky draws for new project tokens. Zero barrier and huge rewards.
• HODLer:
Hold just 1 GT to automatically receive airdrops from multiple projects, with no lockups or extra actions required. Simply hold, and earn.
• Launchpad:
Access early-stage, high-quality token launches and share the upside. Strict screening ensures quality, and fair mechanisms protect your participation rights.
• Earn:
Offers a variety of wealth-management products, including Simple Earn, Auto-Invest, Dual Investment, Quant Funds, Crypto Loan, and more. Stake BTC, ETH, and GT to earn higher APR. VIP users enjoy extra benefits.
• Bots:
Supports a full range of trading bots across spot and futures, including Grid Bot, Martingale Bot, Smart Rebalance Bot, Arbitrage Bot, Inter-Exchange Arbitrage Bot, Infinite Grid, Margin Grid, CTA-Expert Bot, Signal Bot, and more.
• Copy Trading:
Gate Copy Trading allows users to instantly replicate the spot and futures trades of professional traders or lead traders, enabling rapid execution of trading strategies with an overall position synchronization rate of up to 99.99%.
• Community:
Stay at the forefront of crypto news and discussions with Gate Community. Explore real-time updates, live streams, and hot-topic chats to catch upcoming events and breaking news.

- First exchange to commit to 100% Proof of Reserves
Gate's reserves cover over 200 digital assets, leveraging Merkle trees and zero-knowledge proof technology to fully secure user funds, with an excess reserve exceeding $11.676 billion.
- Premium experience with 24/7 support

1. For security reasons, a hold may apply on first time payments. The delay allows fraud security checks to take place and gives you time to alert us to unauthorised or suspicious activity on your account. Subsequent payments should be received in under a minute.

5. Offer can be withdrawn at any time without notice. 10% back in travel credits applies to the booking amount you pay for excluding any Awards points or travel credits redeemed. If you cancel or the supplier cancels the flight or hotel booking for any reason, the 10% back in travel credits will be forfeited.

Take Control of Your Global Payments with Payoneer

Manage your business payments from anywhere with Payoneer, the ultimate platform for global payment solutions. Tailored for small to medium-sized businesses (SMBs), corporate entities, and entrepreneurs, Payoneer makes international money transfers and online payment processing seamless, secure, and cost-effective.

Why Choose Payoneer?

Receive Payments Globally.
Effortlessly send money overseas or receive payments in popular currencies like USD, EUR, GBP, JPY, and more. With Payoneer, you’ll gain access to international payment gateway solutions specifically designed for SMBs. Withdraw funds to your local business bank account in over 150 countries or access them instantly using your Payoneer card.

Simplify Payments for Businesses
Whether you’re paying service providers, suppliers, or contractors, Payoneer’s payment solutions ensure smooth, reliable transactions in over 200 countries. Enjoy fast and affordable digital payment options that help you avoid high fees and delays—allowing your business to operate efficiently.
Manage Finances with Ease

Track and control your finances on the go. 
From monitoring payments to managing balances across multiple currencies, Payoneer provides tools that enhance your financial flexibility and reliability. Competitive currency conversion rates empower you to pay suppliers in their preferred currencies while maximizing your cost savings.
Expand Your Business with Confidence

Leverage seller-specific features like VAT payments in multiple countries and working capital offers for platforms like Amazon and Walmart. Easily scale your business with immediate access to funds while ensuring ongoing cash flow efficiency.

Why Download the Payoneer App?
The Payoneer app makes managing your global payment solutions more convenient than ever. Oversee international money transfers and monitor payment solutions directly from your smartphone, bringing flexibility to your financial operations.

Reliable Customer Support
Our multilingual team is available 24/7 to assist with your digital payment solutions in over 20 languages. Whether you’re troubleshooting or have questions, we’re always just a click away.

Get Started Today
Join millions of businesses worldwide already using Payoneer to simplify their international money transfers and enhance their growth. Download the app now to unlock the power of a truly efficient global payment platform!

De-Register

Security (FingerPrint, Change TPIN, Forgot TPIN, Forgot Password, Change Password)

MyPay is mainly to give financial services to the unbanked population, thereby enabling broader financial inclusion. The other important objective is to provide a safe, secure, and easy tool for incoming tourists to make local payments conveniently.

We pioneered mobile payments, QR codes, Soundbox, and in-store devices in India - and we continue to lead with innovation. In the BHIM UPI ecosystem, Paytm is the only UPI app that builds features based on real user needs. From personalised UPI IDs and privacy-first controls to widgets, bank balance visibility, and Excel UPI statements, we innovate to make digital payments smarter, safer, and more private - only on Paytm.

Paytm UPI now works internationally in UAE, Singapore, France, Mauritius, Bhutan, Sri Lanka, and Nepal - making it easy for Indian travellers to send money or pay abroad instantly.

Why Paytm?
● India’s safest, most secure UPI money transfer app

2. Personalised UPI ID - Choose name@ptyes or name@ptaxis instead of revealing your number.

9. Auto Top-Up for UPI Lite - Never run out of Lite balance with automated top-ups.
10. Self Transfers - Move money between your own bank accounts instantly.

● Paytm UPI - Send and receive money using just a mobile number. Scan any QR code, pay at shops, and more.
● Paytm UPI Lite - PIN-less payments up to ₹4,000/day. Works even when banks are down. Auto top-up and clutter-free bank statements.
● RuPay Credit Card on UPI - Link your RuPay card and pay via UPI. No OTP, no CVV. Earn rewards at shops and online.

Paytm Card Machines (Soundbox + Swipe)

 All with real-time payment confirmation via iconic Paytm sound.

developer: G2C Office, Royal Government of Bhutan
description:
BETA is an app developed to facilitate Tax Pay Payers in submitting their tax returns.

Taxpayers would be able to submit their business tax returns via the app without having to come in contact with a tax collector. Upon verification by the concerned agency on the self-declared tax returns submitted, the taxpayer would be notified in the BETA app to make the tax payment.   

However, the tax payment would be done through digital payment solutions provided by the Banks in Bhutan. 

The taxpayer would be able to access the link to avail of the Tax Clearance Certificate through BETA and also access contact details of the Regional Revenue and Customs office.

Department of Revenue and Customs
Ministry of Finance
Thimphu, Bhutan
Phone: +975-2-322319 / 333509
www.drc.gov.bt

YONO SBI: Bank, Invest, Shop, Travel, Pay Bills, Recharge, use UPI to transfer money


YONO SBI lets you Bank, Shop, Travel, Pay Bills, Recharge, Invest, avail IRCTC ticket booking, use UPI to transfer money, book movie tickets. With YONO SBI, convenience has a new name.


Download YONO SBI, our mobile banking and lifestyle application from iOS App store only and experience its best-in-class features. Do not use any other websites.


Registration process:
YONO is supported on iOS 15 and above.
• Install/update new version of App from App Store and open.
• Allow all required permission (location).
• Select SIM of CBS Registered Mobile Number (RMN) and submit NEXT.
• An encrypted SMS with a unique code will be sent from the device to Bank’s VMN (Virtual Mobile Number) to verify the customer. Kindly note that for sending the SMS standard SMS charges are applicable as per your telecom plan. The SIM should have an active outgoing SMS facility.
• If there are multiple CIF's attached with same mobile number, system will prompt for the account number and DOB for finding out a unique customer by the mobile number.
• If the customer is already having online banking facility of SBI, App will automatically prompt to proceed to register on YONO SBI app with existing user credentials (Online Banking User ID and Password). After entering User ID and Password, customer will receive an OTP on Registered Mobile Number. User has to enter the OTP in the app to complete registration with an optional setting of MPIN.
• If the existing SBI customer is not having Online banking credentials, App will prompt to proceed to create INB credential using "Account Details" and "ATM Card" based registration process.
• If Non RMN SIM is selected, user will land on account opening screen. If customer claims that selected SIM is already registered with bank, user needs to visit nearest branch with KYC for updating/ validating the mobile number in bank account.


What YONO SBI offers you


YONO SBI, SBI's latest mobile banking offering is an extension of our trusted banking legacy which gave India secure digital products such as YONO Lite and SBI Net Banking. YONO SBI puts India's largest range of products and services at your fingertips.
• India's largest shopping marketplace - Exclusive discounts and offers for SBI customers across merchants who offer shopping, vacation bookings, flight and bus ticket bookings, train ticket bookings through IRCTC, food delivery and much more
• Quick Transfer-Immediate fund transfer to new beneficiary up to Rs.50,000/- per day
• One view- Link and view your relationships with all State Bank entities (Credit Cards, Life Insurance, General Insurance, Travel Insurance, Accident Insurance, SIP, Mutual Funds or investments) in one app
• Your friend in need-Get Pre-approved personal loans on the go within 2 minutes, with no documentation at branches.
• Liquidity on the go-Use this one click facility to avail overdraft against Fixed Deposit
• Experience convenience: Request Cheque Books, ATM Cards/Debit Cards or use the emergency services to change ATM PIN, block ATM cards/Debit cards or stop cheques, through YONO SBI


Other pre log in features:
• ATM/Branch Locator
• Forgot MPIN?- To reset Login MPIN
• View Balance -View account balance & recent transactions

The Bitcoin.com Wallet is a multichain, self-custody Bitcoin and cryptocurrency wallet.
Key features include:

SELF-CUSTODIAL
Not even Bitcoin.com has access to your funds, and you can port your assets to another crypto wallet whenever you want.

SECURE ACCESS
Unlock your Wallet app with biometrics or PIN.

AUTOMATED BACKUP
Automatically back up all your wallets to the cloud and decrypt them with a single master password. 

CUSTOMISABLE FEES
You decide the network fee. Up the fee for faster network confirmations. Lower it when you're not in a rush. 

WIDGETS
Install live market-data widgets on your home screen. Track cryptocurrencies throughout your day.

MARKETS VIEW
Track the price action and get key info on the top cryptocurrencies.

PERSONAL NOTES
Add text to your transactions to remind you who sent what, when, and where.

SEND VIA SOCIAL
Send a payment link to anyone using any messaging app. Funds are received/claimed instantly with just one click.

CUSTOMISABLE DISPLAY CURRENCY
Choose your preferred display currency alongside your crypto (eg. USD, EUR, GBP, JPY, CAD, AUD, and more).

Why You’ll Love Dime:

BNB Remit is a cutting-edge mobile banking initiative introduced by Bhutan National Bank Ltd.,
specifically designed to meet the remittance requirements of Bhutanese citizens living abroad,
referred to as BLA. This innovative application serves as a seamless solution for receiving
inward remittances, guaranteeing fast and secure transactions for BLA individuals. By
integrating innovative payment features, BNB Remit ensures swift money transfers, allowing
BLA members to effortlessly receive funds directly into their bank accounts. This user-friendly
solution simplifies money transfers between loved ones, even across significant distances,
fostering seamless connectivity.
 In the realm of remittance services, BNB Remit stands out for its ability to provide fast, secure,
and easily accessible fund transfer options, automated incentive payout, higher transaction
limits and lower transfer fees.
 
Key Features:
a. Instant Registration: Seamlessly register using your phone number.
b. Real-Time Exchange Rates: Stay updated with dynamically adjusted exchange rates on a daily basis.
c. Beneficiary Addition: Easily add the account details of your loved ones or your personal account for seamless transactions.
d. Secure Fund Transfers: Conveniently and securely send money to desired recipients.
